name: CNCS - Incident Classification
description:
CNCS - Incident Classification - Boosting Portuguese Cybersecurity - 
Together, we can build a Safer Digital Future

Portuguese National Taxonomy: A playbook to classify the incident according to CNCS taxonomy.
author: Luis Banza, Rodrigo Cardoso, Helder Fernandes, Celson Junior, Miguel Nogueira, GALP CSIRT TEAM
